Html: is there any tool to convert a monochromatic image to a byte array to include as the logo data property ??
You can't use images or icons for the ModernWindow.LogoData property. You need to specify a Geometry, as is demonstrated here.

I use my own geometry data to set a windows logo and I see that the logo is stretched. Well, I should say that the logo doesn't have even width and height, but I was expecting to see a scaled image rather then stretched. Is it a normal behaviour?
